de.dviererbe.healthtrack.persistence

Interface IWeightWidgetRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IDisposable, IRepository<WeightRecord,IWeightWidgetRepository.RepositoryException>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    WeightWidgetSQLiteRepository

    public interface IWeightWidgetRepository
extends IRepository<WeightRecord,IWeightWidgetRepository.RepositoryException>, IDisposable
    A storage mechanism for the weight widget data.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  IWeightWidgetRepository.CountIsNotPositive
      The Exception that is thrown when GetRecordsDescending(long, int) is called and the parameter count is not positive.
      static class  IWeightWidgetRepository.DateOfDayIsNull
      The Exception that is thrown when GetRecordsForDayDescending(java.time.LocalDate) is called and the parameter dateOfDay is null.
      static class  IWeightWidgetRepository.OffsetIsNegative
      The Exception that is thrown when GetRecordsDescending(long, int) is called and the parameter offset is negative.
      static class  IWeightWidgetRepository.RecordIdentifierIsNull
      The Exception that is thrown when a specified record identifier is null.
      static class  IWeightWidgetRepository.RecordNotFound
      The Exception that is thrown when DeleteRecord is called and no record with the specified recordIdentifier was found.
      static class  IWeightWidgetRepository.RepositoryDisposed
      The Exception that is thrown when a method is called after the repository was disposed.
      static class  IWeightWidgetRepository.RepositoryException
      The Exception that is thrown when an unexpected I/O error occurs in the repository implementation.
      static class  IWeightWidgetRepository.WeightRecordIdentifierIsNull
      The Exception that is thrown when CreateOrUpdateRecord is called and the parameter weightRecord.Identifier is null.
      static class  IWeightWidgetRepository.WeightRecordIsNull
      The Exception that is thrown when CreateOrUpdateRecord is called and the parameter weightRecord is null.

      Gets the count of all stored records.
      java.util.List<WeightRecord> GetRecordsDescending(long offset, int count)
      Gets a sequence of weight records with the maximum length of count in descending order sorted by the time of measurement beginning at the offset.
      java.util.List<WeightRecord> GetRecordsForDayDescending(java.time.LocalDate dateOfDay)
      Gets all records for a specified day in descending order sorted by the time of measurement.

      • GetRecordsDescending

        java.util.List<WeightRecord> GetRecordsDescending(long offset,
                                                  int count)
                                           throws IWeightWidgetRepository.OffsetIsNegative,
                                                  IWeightWidgetRepository.CountIsNotPositive,
                                                  IWeightWidgetRepository.RepositoryDisposed,
                                                  IWeightWidgetRepository.RepositoryException
        Gets a sequence of weight records with the maximum length of count in descending order sorted by the time of measurement beginning at the offset.
        Specified by:
        GetRecordsDescending in interface IRepository<WeightRecord,IWeightWidgetRepository.RepositoryException>
        Parameters:
        offset - zero based n-th element in descending order where to begin reading records
        count - maximum number of record to be read from the repository
        Returns:
        read sequence of weight records
        Throws:
        IWeightWidgetRepository.OffsetIsNegative - when offset is negative.
        IWeightWidgetRepository.CountIsNotPositive - when count is not positive.
        IWeightWidgetRepository.RepositoryDisposed - when the repository was already disposed.
        IWeightWidgetRepository.RepositoryException - when an unexpected I/O error occurs.
